panels.description: If site 3 goes down and all requested resources start up in site 1 and 2, this would be the current usage of cores
panels.title: Compute Spread

targets.expr:
100
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", node=~".*-norwayeast1.*"}) by (node)
*
sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
-
sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)

(
  sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
  -
  sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
) 
/
sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast1.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
* 100

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast2.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
-

(

  -
  sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter", instance=~".*-norwayeast2.*"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) by (node)
